programme.title: The Miracle on 34th Street 1955
programme.desc: In The Miracle on 34th Street, a kindly old man hired to play Santa Claus at Macy’s insists that he is the real Kris Kringle. As his warmth and generosity touch everyone around him, skeptics take him to court to prove his claim. Blending holiday charm, heartfelt performances, and a timeless message about faith and belief, this television adaptation of the classic story reminds audiences that sometimes the greatest miracles are the ones we choose to believe in.

programme.title: A Christmas Without Snow 1980
programme.desc: In A Christmas Without Snow, Michael Learned stars as a recently divorced woman who moves to San Francisco to rebuild her life. Joining the choir of a struggling church, she finds friendship, strength, and a new sense of purpose under the guidance of the stern but inspiring choirmaster (John Houseman). As the group prepares for a performance of Handel’s Messiah, their shared struggles and triumphs bring them closer together, revealing the true meaning of hope and community during the holiday season. Heartfelt and uplifting, this made-for-TV classic shines with warmth and faith.

programme.title: The Big 22 Rifle for Christmas 1952
programme.desc: In The Big 22 Rifle for Christmas, a heartwarming holiday drama turns tragic when a boy’s dream gift becomes the center of an unexpected accident. As a small-town community reels, the story explores themes of responsibility, forgiveness, and the true meaning of Christmas. Tenderly told and emotionally powerful, this short film offers a timeless reminder of the importance of love, understanding, and family during the holiday season.

programme.title: The Shanty Where Santy Claus Lives 1933
programme.desc: In The Shanty Where Santy Claus Lives, a heartwarming Merrie Melodies cartoon, a lonely boy is taken in by Santa on Christmas Eve and whisked away to a magical shanty filled with toys, music, and holiday cheer. As the night unfolds, the child discovers the joy of belonging and the true spirit of Christmas. With lively animation, whimsical gags, and a touching message, this Depression-era short captures both the hardship and hope of the season.

programme.title: Santa Claus Conquers the Martians 1964
programme.desc: In Santa Claus Conquers the Martians, holiday cheer goes interplanetary when Martians, desperate to bring joy to their children, kidnap Santa and whisk him away to the Red Planet. With the help of two Earth kids and his boundless Christmas spirit, Santa turns the tables on his captors and spreads laughter across the galaxy. Campy, colorful, and brimming with 1960s sci-fi charm, this cult favorite delivers a cosmic dose of yuletide fun.

programme.title: Roll On Texas Moon 1946
programme.desc: Roy Rogers rides tall in Roll On Texas Moon, a Western packed with action, music, and romance. When a bitter feud erupts between cattlemen and sheep ranchers, Roy steps in to prevent bloodshed and uncover the schemers fueling the conflict. With Dale Evans, George ‘Gabby’ Hayes, and the Sons of the Pioneers along for the ride, the film blends fast-paced adventure, trail songs, and Texas charm into a classic Roy Rogers showdown.

programme.title: Sagebrush Trail
programme.desc: A man framed for murder escapes prison and goes west, where he joins a gang with the real killer involved.

programme.title: 3 Bullets for Ringo 1966
programme.desc: In 3 Bullets for Ringo, Mickey Hargitay stars as a gunslinger out for vengeance in a land torn by greed and treachery. When a ruthless band of outlaws threatens both his life and his honor, Ringo must rely on his fast draw and relentless will to even the score. With tense standoffs, double-crosses, and the gritty flair of Spaghetti Western style, this action-packed tale proves that three bullets may be all a man needs to settle his destiny.

programme.title: Texas Trouble Shooters

programme.title: The Klansmen

programme.title: Look_Out_Sister_1947
programme.desc: A famous bandleader, suffering from overwork and exhaustion, goes to a sanitarium for a rest. programme.title: Guest Stephanie Etienne
programme.desc: Center 1968 is helping Black women get into politics and government. Listen to Stephanie Etienne, their Executive Director, as she gets you fired up about taking control and shows you how they’re helping women shift policy and build leadership pipelines.

programme.title: Guests Ashley Capri, Charlie Mac
programme.desc: Yonathan Elias is joined by Guests Ashley Capri and Charlie Mac, who play Couch Party for the Culture and for cash!

programme.title: September 29, 2025
programme.desc: The Rev. Dr. Al Sharpton delivers a video message for September 29, 2025, encouraging you to act with intent and purpose. Every day brings new challenges and opportunities. reACT accordingly!

programme.title: Parenting Advice From a Doctor You Must Know with Dr. Rob Gore
programme.desc: This week we have ER doctor, author, community organizer, and all-around stellar human being, Dr. Rob Gore, MD, on with Nessa and Katrina B! He joins us on the podcast to talk about his new book and share his incredible journey from being the child of community organizers living in pre-gentrified Brooklyn to Morehouse College, through his time as a medical resident in Chicago, then his return to his hometown to serve his community as an emergency room physician. He discusses his experiences and how being a community organizer has informed his ability to be a better physician and parent. As a parent himself, he drops plenty of MUST KNOW advice all throughout this conversation so be sure to TUNE IN!

programme.title: Guest LisaRaye
programme.desc: LisaRaye is an icon. She’s been a star since her first film Ice Cube’s The Player’s Club and today she’s on ALLBLK’s A House Divided. She’s an amazing woman and we talk about acting, learning how to be sexy, the time she shot someone, and she cries about her beloved late father. An amazing conversation.

programme.desc: Hundreds of the best drag racers in the country bring their “A” game to the track in search of glory and their share of $18,000 in cash and prizes in front of thousands of ALL OUT Fans!

programme.title: Horror High 2020 Tyler J. Case
programme.desc: A monster lurks around a high school in the hypnotized town of Willow Hills and picks off tardy students one by one. Now it is up to an unlikely group of teens to put an end to the terror that has plagued many...

programme.title: Lake Terror
programme.desc: Remington has escaped the evil cabin but now the evil continues to follow him, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. Meanwhile, Chloe and Revel look for a missing sister that went to the evil cabin in the previous installment. The two meet Vincent, a failing TV host, to help psychically contact the missing sister. That's when a gunshot rings out in the night and the three meet Remington. Now they all must battle for their lives against the evil that pursues Remington to once and for all lock the evil away for good...

programme.title: Jack and Jill: The Hills of Hell
programme.desc: After searching for her missing daughter, a lady and her search party discover the legend behind the murderous pair of Jack and Jill...

programme.title: Día del Abandono
programme.desc: Jenny Bilson, una estudiante de último curso de instituto, es la estudiante perfecta, la maravillosa hija de un veterano detective de policía y todo un sueño americano. Pero el único error que no es consciente de haber cometido está a punto de perseguirla de una forma muy violenta, cuando su pasado regresa en busca de venganza...

programme.title: Isla Pitón
programme.desc: Un grupo de personas que buscan un árbol mágico en una selva misteriosa descubren que no están solos. Algo los observa, esperando el momento perfecto para atacar...

programme.title: Jack y Jill: Las Colinas del Infierno
programme.desc: Tras buscar a su hija desaparecida, una dama y su grupo de búsqueda descubren la leyenda que se esconde tras la pareja asesina de Jack y Jill...

programme.title: Ouija: Reunión Mortal
programme.desc: Sucesos extraños les ocurren a unos amigos antes de una fiesta de cumpleaños en un gran almacén. Dos de ellos encuentran un viejo tablero de espiritismo y deciden contactar con los antiguos inquilinos de la víctima fallecida...

programme.title: Asesinos Sin Ley
programme.desc: Mickey y Jenny son imigrantes indocumentados, un dia el patrón de Jenny trata de abusar de ella, Mickey lo sorprende y lo mata haceindo justicia por su propia mano así se desatan una cacería de criminales abusadores, todo lo sueben a las redes convirtiéndose en los anti-héroes más populares por hacer justicia a los desamparados.

programme.title: El Gavilán Justiciero
programme.desc: Historia llena de acción donde la codicia y la ambición desatan la más cruenta lucha, que trae como consecuencia el sufrimiento de una familia y la envidia de otra.

programme.title: Arareko Amor y Odio
programme.desc: Cuando fueron jóvenes no pudieron realizar su amor, ahora sus hijos vuelven a enamorarse. pero las envidias desatan el odio y la muerte en este bello pueblo llamado Estación Creel.

programme.title: Gritos del Monday
programme.desc: Un grupo de estudiantes de Ingeniería Ambiental realizan un trabajo en la Reserva Ecológica de los Saltos del Monday, conocido por su rica fauna y su rica historia. Para el trabajo, los alumnos deciden acampar en el lugar, en medio de la obscura noche son sorprendidos por un hecho que desencadenará a lo largo de sus días posteriores, en especial a una de las estudiantes.

programme.title: Choele
programme.desc: Todo ocurre en el pueblo de Choele Choel, provincia de Río Negro. Un niño y su padre intentan seguir juntos todo el verano, pero el chico ya decidió partir hacia otro lugar con su madre, cuando ésta llegue y le recoja. A la zona donde viven llega una chica, por la que comienzan a competir padre e hijo.

programme.title: Cuernavaca
programme.desc: El mundo de Andy cambia totalmente cuando su madre tiene un accidente. Sin nadie que lo cuide, es llevado a Cuernavaca, a la casa de su desconocida abuela paterna. Mientras su madre se debate entre la vida y la muerte, el niño se enfrentará a la frialdad de su abuela, al mundo seductor y peligroso del hijo del jardinero y a la búsqueda de su padre

programme.title: El Juego del Sexo
programme.desc: Un alienígena cambiante procedente del espacio exterior causa estragos en un pequeño pueblo rural del suroeste de Estados Unidos, cerca del legendario Área 51 de fama ovni. Estos extraterrestres son una raza devoradora de cerebros a quienes les encanta decapitar y comerse a los humanos. Están entre nosotros y lo han estado durante millones de años.

programme.title: El Duende
programme.desc: Rosalía se muda a la ciudad junto a su hijo pequeño, Ramiro. Con la ayuda de una conocida, consigue encontrar vivienda. La casa ha estado cerrada por décadas, y tiene un horno antiguo. Lo que Rosalía ignora es que dentro del horno habita un duende que tiene por costumbre robar niños.

programme.title: El Sonido de los Tulipanes
programme.desc: En Buenos Aires durante la crisis del 2001, Marcelo un escritor devenido en periodista, debe volver sobre los últimos pasos de su padre Tonio un consagrado intelectual de quien se encuentra profundamente distanciado cuando muere en condiciones extrañas. De la mano de Carolina la ex secretaria de su padre, Marcelo se sumerge en un mundo oscuro lleno de violencia y ambiciones de poder enfrentándose a “El Loco” Bertolini. Pero el peligro no solo lo acechará a él sino también a los suyos. ¿Podrá Marcelo encontrar los verdaderos motivos de la muerte de su padre?
